title: Tuberculosis: its diagnosis, treatment and control
subject_group: Food, Health, Lifestyle, Medicine, Psychology & Safety/Diseases
Food, Health, Lifestyle, Medicine, Psychology & Safety/Tuberculosis

description: Shows the nature, means of transmission, the diagnosis, the treatment of pulmonary tuberculosis. Sunlight and fresh, freely circulating air are the enemies of germs; many city dwellers are, therefore, constantly exposed to the danger of infection with tuberculosis. This film tells the story of Mary Smith, and American high school student who with her aunt is treated successfully.
